Dialysis.description: The process of filtering wastes and extra fluid from the body by means other than the kidneys.
Dialysis.name: Dialysis

Hemodialysis.description: Using a machine to circulate a person’s blood through a filter outside the body.
Hemodialysis.name: Hemodialysis

Peritoneal Dialysis.description: Using the lining of the abdomen to filter a person’s blood inside the body.
Peritoneal Dialysis.name: Peritoneal Dialysis

Renal Replacement Therapy.description: Therapy that replaces the normal blood-filtering function of the kidneys.
Renal Replacement Therapy.name: Renal Replacement Therapy

Renal Transplant.description: The organ transplant of a kidney into a patient.
Renal Transplant.name: Renal Transplant
